title: Mondo Bio Cafe and Shop
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Western, Fast food
description: Vegetarian cafe attached to a large shop that sells a large range products, including herbal remedies and natural cosmetics. Menu changes seasonally. Food is prepared in the morning and placed on displayed and heated upon request. Allergy-friendly options. Owners speak basic English. Previously located at Via Fuorimura 20, Oct 2015.
